box-shadow: 0 2px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); &:after { content: ''; display: block; clear: both; } .encloser { position: relative; color: #81878e; text-align: center; .title { text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 18px; padding-bottom: 10px; } .user { font-size: 12px; text-transform: uppercase; padding-bottom: 20px; } .svg-icon-close { width: 30px; height: 30px; stroke: #81878e; fill: #81878e; position: absolute; top: 0px; right: 10px; } .svg-icon-sign { width: 55px; height: 55px; stroke: $pe-blue-color; fill: $pe-blue-color; margin-bottom: 20px; } .date-sign { background: $pe-blue-color; border-radius: 6px; max-height: 160px; position: relative; padding: 30px 20px; margin: 10px; transition: all 1s; &.sign-done { max-height: 120px; padding: 20px; overflow: auto; margin: 10px; } .msg { font-size: 24px; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; padding: 15px; } .flex-it { display: flex; align-items: center; } .triangle-down { width: 0; position: absolute; height: 0; bottom: -10px; left: 49%; border-left: 6px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid transparent; border-top: 10px solid $pe-blue-color; } .date { width: 50%; font-size: 24px; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; padding: 15px; padding-left: 0px; } } .sign-donut { border-left: 0.5px solid #fff; width: 50%; } .sign-section { background: #268cf8; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-around; padding: 15px; padding-right: 0px; .percent { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: #fff; } } .card { background: #fff; padding: 0px; .donut-chart { position: relative; border-radius: 50%; overflow: hidden; .slice { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } .chart-center { position: absolute; border-radius: 50%; } .chart-center span.in-progress { display: block; text-align: center; } .chart-center span.complete { display: block; text-align: center; color: $pe-blue-color; font-family: arial; -ms-transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-35deg); /* IE 9 */ -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-35deg); /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */ transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-35deg); &:after { content: 'L'; } } } .chart { width: 40px; height: 40px; background: #C8E2FC; .chart-center-inprogress { top: 13px; left: 13px; width: 14px; height: 14px; background: #fff; } .chart-center-complete { top: 10px; left: 10px; width: 20px; height: 20px;
